original_text: So she went out, entered a field and began to glean behind the harvesters. As it turned out, she was working in a field belonging to Boaz, who was from the clan of Elimelek.
korean_text: 룻이 가서 베는 자를 따라 밭에서 이삭을 줍는데 우연히 엘리멜렉의 친족 보아스에게 속한 밭에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: and began to glean behind the harvesters.
she was working in a field belonging to Boaz,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 보아스에게 속한 밭에서 일하고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: who was from the clan of Elimelek.
